name: Hundru Falls
description: One of the highest waterfalls in Jharkhand on the Subarnarekha River.
longDescription: Hundru Falls, located near Ranchi, cascades from a height of about 98 meters. Surrounded by lush greenery, it is ideal for nature lovers and photographers.
history: A natural wonder of Jharkhand, historically visited by locals and tourists for its breathtaking scenery.
culturalOverview: Locals consider the area sacred and celebrate small local festivals around it.
importance: Tourism hotspot, eco-tourism, and adventure photography.
thingsToCarry: Water, camera, trekking shoes, light snacks
speciality: Tall waterfall with panoramic cliff views.

name: Jonha Falls
description: Beautiful waterfall near Ranchi with a serene environment.
longDescription: Jonha Falls drops from a height of around 43 meters and is surrounded by dense forests. It is an excellent spot for picnics and nature walks.
history: Known locally for centuries, it has been a popular attraction for the Ranchi district.
culturalOverview: Local communities celebrate nature festivals and rituals nearby.
speciality: Scenic waterfall with a calm, peaceful ambiance.

name: Hirni Falls
description: Waterfall in West Singhbhum district amidst lush forest.
longDescription: Hirni Falls is known for its stunning 37-meter drop and natural surroundings. The site offers trekking trails and photo opportunities.
history: A natural site historically frequented by locals for leisure and nature appreciation.
culturalOverview: Forests around Hirni Falls are home to tribal communities with their cultural practices.
thingsToCarry: Trekking shoes, water, camera, insect repellent

name: Panchghagh Falls
description: Cluster of five waterfalls near Khunti district.
longDescription: Panchghagh Falls is famous for its unique five-stream waterfalls cascading over rocky terrain. Surrounded by forests, it is perfect for adventure seekers.
history: A popular local picnic spot for generations, attracting families and tourists.
culturalOverview: Area celebrated by tribal communities, often with traditional music during visits.
importance: Tourism, picnic site, and adventure exploration.
thingsToCarry: Water, camera, trekking gear, picnic supplies
speciality: Five simultaneous waterfalls over rocky terrain.

name: Glory Falls
description: Hidden gem waterfall in West Singhbhum.
longDescription: Glory Falls is relatively less known but offers a serene environment with cascading water through rocky cliffs. Ideal for photography and nature walks.
history: Traditionally visited by locals, gaining attention recently among eco-tourists.
culturalOverview: The nearby tribal settlements honor the waterfall in local stories and rituals.
thingsToCarry: Camera, trekking shoes, water, light snacks

name: Dhur-Dhur Falls
description: Rapid waterfall on the Banai River near Gumla.
longDescription: Dhur-Dhur Falls is known for its swift cascading waters and rocky surroundings. It is an adventurous location suitable for nature lovers.
history: Locals have used it as a bathing and recreational spot for centuries.
culturalOverview: Nearby villages celebrate river-based local festivals occasionally.
thingsToCarry: Water, camera, trekking shoes, safety gear

name: Royal Falls
description: Tall waterfall in Gumla district surrounded by dense forest.
longDescription: Royal Falls cascades from a height of approximately 60 meters and is surrounded by greenery. It is a hotspot for nature photography.
history: A local natural attraction historically frequented for leisure.
culturalOverview: Tribal communities nearby perform nature-related rituals.
speciality: Tall, scenic waterfall with forest backdrop.

name: Murmur Falls
description: Small yet picturesque waterfall in Jharkhand.
longDescription: Murmur Falls is surrounded by lush greenery and offers a calm environment for visitors. Ideal for short treks and relaxation.
history: Locally known waterfall attracting nearby villagers for picnics.
culturalOverview: Used in local traditions and occasional small gatherings.
thingsToCarry: Water, camera, comfortable shoes, light snacks
